name: Bon Voyage!
description:
Bon Voyage! is a coop video game in 3D where you have to guide a crowd of tourists through various levels. Each player have a specific power to achieve his goal : one guide can attract the crowd while the other one can repell them. Commmunication is essentiel to manage those unruly travelers!
Obstacles and unforeseen events will hit your path, scattering and knocking down tourists, jeopardizing the mission of bringing them all back safely.

Art : Kim & Jant
Development : Anthelme, Jacky & Charly
Sound design : Adrien

Case study on Behance
Feel free to contact us on our Twitter account if you have any further questions regarding the game 😊
